title: Urban Elegance in Vibrant Bengaluru
description: Premium comfort meets stylish grandeur in the district of Whitefield in Bengaluru, providing an urban oasis of bars, night markets and micro-breweries among the city's high-tech lifestyle. Spend a long weekend nestled within India’s IT and nightlife hub at the newly opened The Den Bengaluru with daily breakfast, one buffet dinner for two once during the stay and one 30-minute massage each once during the stay at the lush Sanctuary.
offer_address: ITPL Main Road, Whitefield, Whitefield, 560066 Bangalore, India

title: Chic All-Suite Bangalore Retreat in Koramangala with Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Indulge in five-star luxury in the vibrant southeastern Koramangala neighbourhood of Bangalore. This urban oasis offers modern comforts, providing a peaceful escape. Savour traditional Indian cuisine at the onsite dining venues, relish a hot buffet breakfast to fuel your explorations and unwind in the outdoor pool or with a spa treatment.

Enjoy a leisurely stroll through the captivating landscapes of nearby Mesthripalya Lake, marvel at the grandeur of Bangalore Palace or explore the bustling streets of Commercial Street for a unique shopping experience.

title: Contemporary Inner-City Racecourse Hotel with Rooftop Pool
description: Move at a slower pace when you retreat to Holiday Inn Bengaluru Racecourse, an IHG Hotel. With an enviable turf-side address, you can canter down to the grassy grounds to watch a race, get the birds-eye view from the hotel’s rooftop pool or take a peek through your turf-view window. Dine at Cafe G for a power-packed breakfast or indulge in modern Indian cuisine and innovative cocktails at Glass Kitchen & Bar. Dedicate some time to yourself with a massage at the onsite spa before trotting into the Bengaluru city centre to explore the local entertainment and cultural sites.
location_description: Holiday Inn Bengaluru Racecourse, an IHG Hotel
